Description: Part of the blade of a bifacial knife: of pale brown flint, carefully pressure flaked. The jagged cutting edge has been damaged and the piece is broken off at each end.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Djet, Bears excavator's mark, Z.
Curator's comments: Petrie, Abydos I, 8, pl.XIV, centre of group marked Z
